AD_SecondTide_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SecondTide_0.text: *Second Tide is the Umberlant holy day when the timber harvest for shipbuilding is blessed by the sacrifice of a juvenile kraken.*

AD_FloodTide_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_FloodTide_0.text: *Flood Tide is the Umberlant holy day celebrating the arrival of the winter storms with the sacrifice of a withered crone.*

AD_DarkTide_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_DarkTide_0.text: *Dark Tide is the Umberlant holy day celebrating the late summer neap tide with the sacrifice of a black hippocampus.*

AD_FirstTide_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_FirstTide_0.text: *First Tide is the Umberlant holy day when the harbours first open to spring sea trade, celebrated by sacrificing a great turtle.*
